column5: Just started to rain heavy here in Kitchener at 3pm. At 3:30pm we started to get some hail coming down. It's about the size of dimes. Tornado warning in effect for Waterloo Region. Nice weather for August.
Mississauga here.  Thunderstorms are moving through here as well now.  Thunder, lightning, rain, small hail so far -- but at least it hasn't been a soaker yet.
Etobicoke just had what seemed like a hurricane roll through.  Hope nobody is caught out on the water in this storm.

Hong Kong here...  On a layover and typhoon "Goni" is passing by. Can't wait to get back to the boat and trailer on Sturgeon which is about to get hit by a line of thunderstorms as well.  There's no place like home!
Exhibition place; huge storm rolled through, Seemed to have calmed for now â€“ 4:50 pm going home!
99.5*F at 5:36 pm in 'Bama... has cooled off from 100.0*F in the last 30 minutes!!!
absolutely pouring buckets in hamilton.  the tarp on the boat is sprung like a bowstring, full of rain and hail in 5 minutes.
